Summary: Extremely bright. Pulsated white lights. Slowly moved to my right then vanished
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Cumming
There were no other sightings in Cumming on or around January 4th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsMy sister and I were driving down the highway going back home when I noticed it in the sky. It was beautiful, and flashed a white light, pulsated for a quick second, slowly hovered to my right and then disappeared. It was my first sighting, and even though it was not that crazy of one, it left me in awe.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
